enhanced_description: Magic EdTech is a global leader in digital learning solutions, offering a comprehensive suite of services to support the entire digital learning lifecycle. Founded in 1990, the company leverages technology to make lifelong digital learning accessible, affordable, and sustainable. Their offerings include a cloud-based mobile learning platform, product content development, and ongoing product maintenance and support. Recognized with a Gold Award from IMS Learning Impact Award 2020 for their MagicBox platform, which serves over 5 million students globally, Magic EdTech boasts a proven track record and a strong focus on accessibility and inclusivity.
